author: Deepa Soman
title: Nikki loves thrashing the hero in Ezhil’s film
text:
Nikki Galrani is busy shooting for her upcoming Tamil movie with filmmaker Ezhil, in which she dons the khaki for the first time in her career.
An excited Nikki reveals that she has lots of stunts to perform in it and is simple loving it! "It is not something you get to do on a daily basis," she says, adding, "My intro scene in the movie itself is quite unlike that of a regular heroine entry, where she sways to a song or flashes her pretty face. Instead, I start off by thrashing five people. I loved it." Nikki's character is named Archana while Vishnu Vishal plays the hero of the untitled movie.
"There are also scenes where I beat up the hero as well as the renowned comedian Soori's character," she says. And do they mind? "Well, I guess Vishnu finds my look in the police uniform quite hilarious, as he starts laughing every time I appear in the attire! But he has no choice other than to get thrashed," she says. The actress, who has about a month more of the shoot left, has also completed Kunchacko Boban-starrer Rajamma@Yahoo and the Telugu film Krishnashtami.
